element.description: Renders out an object using the org.apache.tapestry.services.ObjectRenderer service. Used primarily on the org.apache.tapestry.corelib.pages.ExceptionReport page. This is focused on\ objects that have a specific org.apache.tapestry.services.ObjectRenderer strategy. The org.apache.tapestry.corelib.components.BeanDisplay component is used for displaying the contents of arbitrary objects in terms of a series of property names and values.
